channel.title: Comments on: “Sniping isn’t playing the objective”
channel.description: Welcome to the home of Battlefield V! Your place for discussion, help, news, reviews, questions, screenshots, videos, gifs, and anything else BFV related! Battlefield V is developed by DICE and produced by EA. This subreddit is ran by dedicated fans of the series and has no affiliation with EA or DICE.

item.title: By: Angelov317
item.dc:creator: Angelov317
item.description: Close range sniping is for real men, change my mind
item.content:encoded: Close range sniping is for real men, change my mind

item.title: By: TripStuckin
item.dc:creator: TripStuckin
item.description: Im usually the recon just raining flares, with the help of my 3 support ammo box squadmates. At a certain point the enemy just gets tired of shooting them down lol
item.content:encoded: Im usually the recon just raining flares, with the help of my 3 support ammo box squadmates. At a certain point the enemy just gets tired of shooting them down lol

item.title: By: noobofevil
item.dc:creator: noobofevil
item.description: Nice clip, I love to see some good aggressive recon gameplay
item.content:encoded: Nice clip, I love to see some good aggressive recon gameplay

item.title: By: 21574
item.description: The red skull for the headshot goes hard. I might have to adjust mine from the gold to red. Good clip too. Spot on with those shots.
item.content:encoded: The red skull for the headshot goes hard. I might have to adjust mine from the gold to red. Good clip too. Spot on with those shots.

item.title: By: XenonJFt
item.dc:creator: XenonJFt
item.description: In This game its pretty easy to Cod-snipe because of no scope-sway and fast ADS, at PC servers I still don't know why people camp at the back trying to get someone with bullet drop accomplishing nothing
item.content:encoded: In This game its pretty easy to Cod-snipe because of no scope-sway and fast ADS, at PC servers I still don’t know why people camp at the back trying to get someone with bullet drop accomplishing nothing

item.title: By: thisdevilinI
item.dc:creator: thisdevilinI
item.description: What's up with those spastic mouse flicks?
item.content:encoded: What’s up with those spastic mouse flicks?

item.title: By: thatoneboi928
item.dc:creator: thatoneboi928
item.description: Ever snipe a medic and watch a whole push fall apart, best feeling ever
item.content:encoded: Ever snipe a medic and watch a whole push fall apart, best feeling ever
